bibl.title: Centurions and Horsemen of Legio II Traiana.
bibl.note: 1. Two centurions and the orthographus legionis (P. Hibeh II, 276). - 2. The standard bearer of the legionary horsemen (B.G.U. II, 600). - 3. A legionary horseman as messenger (O. Skeat 11 = S.B. VI, 9118).
Speidel Michael P., Centurions and Horsemen of Legio II Traiana.
145.4 B.G.U. II, 600 O. Skeat Mich. 11 P. Hibeh II, 276
